title: Update a data policy
description: Updates the data masking configuration of an existing data policy.

objective.narrative: This sample demonstrates how to adapt data governance controls as requirements evolve. A developer might need to update a data policy's masking function in BigQuery when a data classification changes or a new masking technique is required for compliance.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2beta1_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_update
regionTags.title: Update a data policy
regionTags.description: Updates the data masking configuration of an existing data policy.
